title: Limeade(Agua de Limón)
instructions: Make the simple syrup.   Dissolve 1 cup of sugar in 1 cup of water.   Bring to a boil.   Boil for 60 seconds.   Let cool.Put the lime juice, simple syrup, and 2 quarts of club soda in a large pitcher and mix well.	Chill and serve.
source: Erick’s personal recipe, after researching different recipes.
